meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Alyssum, especially the yellow alyssum.
meanings.sent1: The madworts in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted some madworts in my backyard for decoration.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the madworts, enjoying the nectar.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a field of madworts in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the madworts filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Thlaspi, especially Thlaspi arvense, or field pennycress.
meanings.sent1: The madworts by the river added a touch of green to the landscape.
meanings.sent2: Farmers often find madworts growing in their fields.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbits played hide-and-seek among the madworts.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight turned the madworts into silver coins in the night.
meanings.sent5: The wind whispered secrets to the madworts, swaying gently in the breeze.
